name: Producthunt Architect
description: Operating System to organize your Producthunt Launch and reach top placementsProducthunt Architect is an unparalleled launch system designed in Notion to help you keep track of all the tasks and to-do's to help you reach top positions when launching on Producthunt.✓ Prepare for launch using this all-in-one system✓ Manage strategies, launches and hunters all in one place✓ Become a Producthunt God and get launch superpowersThis is for you if... ❌ You're never reaching top positions on Producthunt
features: Authority and validation in your niche through powerfulsocialproof.; Thousands of freesignups,downloadsandemailsto your product or email list; Hundreds ofnewcustomers,subscribersorusersthat'll generate revenue right away; Divide your launch into 3 steps: pre-launch, launch and post launch.; Fill out all the data you need, like templates, studies, resources and supporters for your launch.; Write down the steps you need to take for a succesful launch.; Repeat the process for every launch in one organized dashboard.; Easy-to-use dashboard to organize and manage launches; Studies database to analyze other launches and save them; Support database to organize all your supporters in one place
